clinical_study.official_title: Evaluation of Visual Perception Through Diffractive Optical Lens Designs by Virtual Implantation.

brief_summary.textblock: Evaluation of visual perception through diffractive optical lens designs by virtual implantation.

primary_outcome.description: Evaluate visual acuity at distance following virtual implantation of diffractive optical lens designs

intervention.description: Temporary placement of virtual optical lens in the crystalline lens plane.
